text: There's nothing worse than spending tons of time meticulously curling your hair before an event, only to end up with frizzy curls, weird pieces sticking out, an embarrassingly outdated style, or worse... limp locks because your curls didn't even last half an hour. Luckily, we've compiled a list of curling iron errors to avoid so you can achieve gorgeous waves this summer. Mistake : Not Prepping Your Hair In order to get a good curl, you need to prep your hair first. ` ` It's like building a house,'' says celebrity hairstylist Patrick Melville. ` ` You have to create a good foundation for it to hold.''
